about_the_game:
Acorn City: Tropical! is a sandbox building game where you, the player, are given the freedom to build you own island and even it's own bustling town!

Building

Start off simple with a pre-made island or start with a completely blank slate, make the paradise your own! Use our grid based building system to place blocks one by one to make your own tropical retreat, extending shores, carving mountains, digging rivers, building bridges, planting flowers and trees. Be creative, be unique! Make an island truly your own!

City Planning

Work with your campers to help build your very own town, unlocking new tools and items to help pave the way towards a bustling community! From camp to home, make your town your own little friendly neighborhood! Build your economy and drive your community, make your town perfect for you!

Survival

Find and collect resources to expand on your experience! Take care of your needs to stay efficient! Eat, drink, and rest to power through the day and build your own tropical paradise.
